events.message: I just received my order, but the product has several scratches and seems faulty. I'm very disappointed with the condition it arrived in.
The reported issue has been categorized under Product Defect due to customer's description of damage and scratches.
Support agent John Smith has been assigned to handle this case regarding the faulty product received by the customer.
Hello, I’m John from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your product, and I’m here to help get this resolved for you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and any other defects you have noticed, so we can better understand the issue and proceed?
Here are the photos showing the scratches and damaged corners on the product. Let me know what can be done about this problem.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product shipped free of charge or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer the replacement option as I still want the product but in perfect condition. Thank you for offering a solution.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped to you within two business days. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and that it meets your expectations.
We are closing this case now, assuming the replacement product has arrived in good condition and your issue is resolved. Thank you for contacting support.
